592350.name: Nvil
592350.description:
Nvil is a polygon modeling application with rich tool sets. Its deep customization ability provides ways for user to create fast and comfortable workflow to suit individual needs.

The software can be downloaded and tested without time limit at the Nvil forum, .

It is possible to create multiple instances of Nvil. Once Nvil is launched through Steam, it can be launched independent of Steam within a time limit of 3 days. After that, Nvil must be launched through Steam again.

Nvil Kick-Start


Draw Mesh Kick-Start

Features


  • StreamLine tools
  • Composite tools
  • User defined Windows and Hot Windows
  • Radial menus
  • Tool search
  • 3DCoat app_link
  • Hot Keys with sticky behavior
  • Supported formats: obj, fbx, dae, 3ds, md5, smd, dxf
